triples.name: Fuzzy logic
triples.relevance: Paper employs fuzzy-logic systems-based approximation method to handle unknown nonlinear dynamics.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Paper proposes adaptive output feedback control that adjusts to changing system parameters through parameter estimation.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: Paper constructs novel piecewise Lyapunov functional to prove stability of system states and observation error signals.

triples.name: Networked control system
triples.relevance: Paper addresses control problem for networked systems with communication constraints through periodic event-triggered mechanism.

triples.name: State observer
triples.relevance: Paper designs a nonlinear observer to estimate system states from output measurements in networked control setting.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Paper addresses control of networked systems with unknown nonlinear dynamics using adaptive fuzzy techniques.

triples.name: Feedback linearization
triples.relevance: Paper uses adaptive output feedback control which relates to feedback linearization techniques in nonlinear control theory.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Entire paper is grounded in control theory principles for designing stable controllers and observers.
